name: Sandpunk
description:
Note: This is a buggy not really playable 2018 prototype , Looking for developer to help, contact me at info@sandpunk.me

Welcome to Sandpunk, a desert cyberpunk programming game with vehicular combat like in Interstate 76.

Sandpunk combines vehicular combat with programming and 'roguelike' gameplay. Main objectives are either reaching the space elevator and escaping the planet or getting a ride on the movable city where you can get an easy life.

Programming is part of vehicular combat. Programming the turret will free your hands and let you focus on other decisions and events that will occur during combat.
There will be two kinds of programming languages on Sandpunk, visual programming and a generic text programming language (JS-esque). Our intention is to merge the fun of casual programming with games, without the frustration of debugging.
